content: So, what about this idea? I really want to see the rustc-guide advance.
I certainly want to be involved. I don't know if I'm a good choice for a leader.

I was thinking that some tasks might be:

  • draw up a list of chapters (we already have issues on the repo...)
  • every week, try to assign something to write

We should get mark-i-m invovled, they've been amazing
They might even be game to lead
Not sure if they are on zulip
